verbs.description: at reynolds plantation [ARG1: a vision] [V: comes] [ARGM-PRD: together] then falls apart four years ago mercer reynolds iii was at the peak of a wildly successful career the visionary developer had transformed family tracts on lake oconee 80 miles east of atlanta into the nationally renowned reynolds plantation golf community jamie reynolds reynolds plantation reynolds talking plantation
